tidbits.title: Land of Fire and Ice
tidbits.description: Iceland is known as the 'Land of Fire and Ice,' featuring stunning contrasts of glaciers, volcanoes, geysers, and breathtaking natural landscapes.

tidbits.title: Northern Lights
tidbits.description: The country offers remarkable opportunities to witness the Northern Lights (Aurora Borealis), captivating visitors with its celestial light displays.

tidbits.title: Progressive Society
tidbits.description: Iceland is celebrated for its progressive society, gender equality, renewable energy initiatives, and a strong emphasis on environmental conservation.
